tool.name: Retrieve MS-based information
tool.description: add MS-based annotation to your protein list from Peptide Atlas - 2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/retrieve_peptideatlas_2.R --input_type="$input.ids" #if $input.ids == "list" --input="$input.list" #else --input="$input.file" --column_number="$input.ncol" --header="$input.header" #end if --atlas="$atlas" #if "Human_Plasma" in str($atlas) --atlas_Human_Plasma="$__tool_directory__/PA_Human_Plasma_Peptides_2018.txt" --atlas_Human_Plasma_output="PA_Human_Plasma_Peptides_2018_output.txt" #end if #if "Human_Urine" in str($atlas) --atlas_Human_Urine="$__tool_directory__/PA_Human_Urine_Peptides_2018.txt" --atlas_Human_Urine_output="PA_Human_Urine_Peptides_2018_output.txt" #end if #if "Human_Brain" in str($atlas) --atlas_Human_Brain="$__tool_directory__/PA_Human_Brain_Peptides_2018.txt" --atlas_Human_Brain_output="PA_Human_Brain_Peptides_2018_output.txt" #end if #if "Human_Heart" in str($atlas) --atlas_Human_Heart="$__tool_directory__/PA_Human_Heart_Peptides_2018.txt" --atlas_Human_Heart_output="PA_Human_Heart_Peptides_2018_output.txt" #end if #if "Human_Kidney" in str($atlas) --atlas_Human_Kidney="$__tool_directory__/PA_Human_Kidney_Peptides_2018.txt" --atlas_Human_Kidney_output="PA_Human_Kidney_Peptides_2018_output.txt" #end if #if "Human_Liver" in str($atlas) --atlas_Human_Liver="$__tool_directory__/PA_Human_Liver_Peptides_2018.txt" --atlas_Human_Liver_output="PA_Human_Liver_Peptides_2018_output.txt" #end if

param.name: ids
param.label: Provide your identifiers
param.help: Copy/paste or ID list from a file (e.g. table)

param.name: list
param.label: Copy/paste your identifiers
param.help: IDs must be separated by spaces into the form field, for example: P31946 P62258

param.name: file
param.label: Choose a file that contains your list of Uniprot IDs

param.name: header
param.label: Does your input file contain header?

param.name: ncol
param.label: The column number of Uniprot IDs to map
param.help: For example, fill in "c1" if it is the first column, "c2" if it is the second column and so on
